Description:
Our client is an Leading Company in Automobile Industry. They are now looking for a Telesales Executive to join them.Roles & Responsibilities:Contacting potential or existing customers to inform them about a product or service using scripts
Answering questions about products or the company
Asking questions to understand customer requirements.
Gathering information on market trends and customers’ reactions to products
Developing and sustaining strong relationships with customers to encourage repeat business etc.Skills
Skills:
Immediate Joiners 
Must Have Valid Passport
Must have prior experience in Telesales

Bachelor’s Degree Preferred.
Excellent command of both written and spoken English 
Proficient in computer literacy.
